name: Sentinel: Titans War
description:
Sentinel: Titans War

Sentinel: Titans War is a 3rd person Action Adventure game set within Greek Mythology. 

OVERVIEW

Play as Eklektos, a stone golem brought to life by the gods to aid in the war against the raging titans. A new weapon has been decimating the gods, but you are immune and the gods last hope at defeating the titans once and for all. Find and harness the powers of the gods and fight through the hordes of the titan army and turn the tide of this unforgiving war.

How to Install

1. Download the Zipped folder

2. Unzip the contents 

3.  Launch the Sentinel.exe file
